content.text:
Hey [@Tristan](@c+gb3rbKDmCUf+o8Wd4mwsmF9co/4wkahWbCSIMXdsY=.ed25519)!

> Is Scuttlebutt going to de-taint what Facebook did to my Internet?

One way to find out. :crystal_ball:

I think the ideas behind, below, or otherwise adjacent to Scuttlebutt have the potential to change the way we peer, but it's hard to know how the future will be. The thing I *do* know is that the community on Scuttlebutt is first-class, and (in the words of an old friend), **I'm sure you'll fit right in**. Looking forward to getting to know you!
